name: amm_program
docs: Program entrypoint

instructions.name: tammNoop
docs: Self-cpi logging instruction; can only be called internally by the program itself.

instructions.name: createPool
docs: Create a new pool.

accounts.name: rentPayer
docs: The account that pays for the rent to open the pool. This will be stored on the pool
so it can be refunded when the pool is closed.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool will be stored and used to control permissioned pool instructions.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool state account.

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: The whitelist that gatekeeps which NFTs can be bought or sold with this pool.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana system program.

instructions.name: editPool
docs: Edit an existing pool.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool--must sign to edit the pool.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool to edit.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana system program.

instructions.name: closePool
docs: Close a pool if it has no NFTs and is not attached to a shared escrow.

accounts.name: rentPayer
docs: The rent payer to refund pool rent to.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner must sign to close the pool.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool to close.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana system program.

instructions.name: closeExpiredPool
docs: Permissionlessly close an expired pool.

accounts.name: rentPayer
docs: The rent payer to refund pool rent to.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner account must be specified and match the account stored in the pool but does not have to sign
for expired pools.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool to close.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana system program.

instructions.name: depositSol
docs: Deposit SOL into a Token or Trade pool.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool--must sign to deposit SOL.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool to deposit the SOL into.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana system program.

instructions.name: withdrawSol
docs: Withdraw SOL from a Token or Trade pool.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool and will receive the SOL.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool from which the SOL will be withdrawn.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana system program.

instructions.name: depositNft
docs: Deposit a Metaplex legacy NFT or pNFT into a NFT or Trade pool.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool and the NFT.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool the NFT is being transferred to/from.

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: The whitelist that gatekeeps which NFTs can be deposited into the pool.
Must match the whitelist stored in the pool state.

accounts.name: mintProof
docs: Optional account which must be passed in if the NFT must be verified against a
merkle proof condition in the whitelist.

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account of the NFT.

accounts.name: metadata
docs: The Token Metadata metadata account of the NFT.

accounts.name: edition
docs: The Token Metadata edition account of the NFT.

accounts.name: userTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata source token record account of the NFT.

accounts.name: poolTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata token record for the destination.

accounts.name: tokenMetadataProgram
docs: The Token Metadata program account.

accounts.name: sysvarInstructions
docs: The sysvar instructions account.

accounts.name: authorizationRules
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules account that stores royalty enforcement rules.

accounts.name: authorizationRulesProgram
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules program account.

accounts.name: nftReceipt
docs: The NFT deposit receipt, which ties an NFT to the pool it was deposited to.

accounts.name: ownerTa
docs: The token account of the owner, where the NFT will be transferred from.

accounts.name: poolTa
docs: The token account of the pool, where the NFT will be escrowed.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: The SPL Token program for the Mint and ATAs.

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: The SPL associated token program.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana system program.

instructions.name: withdrawNft
docs: Withdraw a Metaplex legacy NFT or pNFT from a NFT or Trade pool.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool and the NFT.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool the NFT is being transferred to/from.

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: The whitelist that gatekeeps which NFTs can be deposited into the pool.
Must match the whitelist stored in the pool state.

accounts.name: mintProof
docs: Optional account which must be passed in if the NFT must be verified against a
merkle proof condition in the whitelist.

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account of the NFT.

accounts.name: metadata
docs: The Token Metadata metadata account of the NFT.

accounts.name: edition
docs: The Token Metadata edition account of the NFT.

accounts.name: userTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata source token record account of the NFT.

accounts.name: poolTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata token record for the destination.

accounts.name: tokenMetadataProgram
docs: The Token Metadata program account.

accounts.name: sysvarInstructions
docs: The sysvar instructions account.

accounts.name: authorizationRules
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules account that stores royalty enforcement rules.

accounts.name: authorizationRulesProgram
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules program account.

accounts.name: nftReceipt
docs: The NFT deposit receipt, which ties an NFT to the pool it was deposited to.

accounts.name: ownerTa
docs: The TA of the owner, where the NFT will be transferred to as a result of this action.

accounts.name: poolTa
docs: The TA of the pool, where the NFT token is escrowed.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: The SPL Token program for the Mint and ATAs.

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: The SPL associated token program.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana system program.

instructions.name: buyNft
docs: Buy a Metaplex legacy NFT or pNFT from a NFT or Trade pool.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool and the buyer/recipient of the NFT.

accounts.name: taker
docs: The taker is the user buying or selling the NFT.

accounts.name: rentPayer
docs: The original rent payer of the pool--stored on the pool. Used to refund rent in case the pool
is auto-closed.

accounts.name: feeVault
docs: Fee vault account owned by the TFEE program.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The Pool state account that the NFT is being sold into. Stores pool state and config,
but is also the owner of any NFTs in the pool, and also escrows any SOL.
Any active pool can be specified provided it is a Token type and the NFT passes at least one
whitelist condition.

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: The whitelist account that the pool uses to verify the NFTs being sold into it.

accounts.name: mintProof
docs: Optional account which must be passed in if the NFT must be verified against a
merkle proof condition in the whitelist.

accounts.name: sharedEscrow
docs: The shared escrow account for pools that have liquidity in a shared account.

accounts.name: makerBroker
docs: The account that receives the maker broker fee.

accounts.name: takerBroker
docs: The account that receives the taker broker fee.

accounts.name: cosigner
docs: The optional cosigner account that must be passed in if the pool has a cosigner.

accounts.name: ammProgram
docs: The AMM program account, used for self-cpi logging.

accounts.name: escrowProgram
docs: The escrow program account for shared liquidity pools.

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account of the NFT.

accounts.name: metadata
docs: The Token Metadata metadata account of the NFT.

accounts.name: edition
docs: The Token Metadata edition account of the NFT.

accounts.name: userTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata source token record account of the NFT.

accounts.name: poolTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata token record for the destination.

accounts.name: tokenMetadataProgram
docs: The Token Metadata program account.

accounts.name: sysvarInstructions
docs: The sysvar instructions account.

accounts.name: authorizationRules
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules account that stores royalty enforcement rules.

accounts.name: authorizationRulesProgram
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules program account.

accounts.name: nftReceipt
docs: The NFT deposit receipt, which ties an NFT to the pool it was deposited to.

accounts.name: takerTa
docs: The TA of the buyer, where the NFT will be transferred.

accounts.name: poolTa
docs: The TA of the pool, where the NFT is held.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: Either the legacy token program or token-2022.

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: The SPL associated token program.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana system program.

instructions.name: sellNftTokenPool
docs: Sell a Metaplex legacy NFT or pNFT into a Token pool.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool and the buyer/recipient of the NFT.

accounts.name: taker
docs: The taker is the user buying or selling the NFT.

accounts.name: rentPayer
docs: The original rent payer of the pool--stored on the pool. Used to refund rent in case the pool
is auto-closed.

accounts.name: feeVault
docs: Fee vault account owned by the TFEE program.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The Pool state account that the NFT is being sold into. Stores pool state and config,
but is also the owner of any NFTs in the pool, and also escrows any SOL.
Any active pool can be specified provided it is a Token type and the NFT passes at least one
whitelist condition.

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: The whitelist account that the pool uses to verify the NFTs being sold into it.

accounts.name: mintProof
docs: Optional account which must be passed in if the NFT must be verified against a
merkle proof condition in the whitelist.

accounts.name: sharedEscrow
docs: The shared escrow account for pools that have liquidity in a shared account.

accounts.name: makerBroker
docs: The account that receives the maker broker fee.

accounts.name: takerBroker
docs: The account that receives the taker broker fee.

accounts.name: cosigner
docs: The optional cosigner account that must be passed in if the pool has a cosigner.

accounts.name: ammProgram
docs: The AMM program account, used for self-cpi logging.

accounts.name: escrowProgram
docs: The escrow program account for shared liquidity pools.

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account of the NFT.

accounts.name: metadata
docs: The Token Metadata metadata account of the NFT.

accounts.name: edition
docs: The Token Metadata edition account of the NFT.

accounts.name: userTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata source token record account of the NFT.

accounts.name: poolTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata token record for the destination.

accounts.name: tokenMetadataProgram
docs: The Token Metadata program account.

accounts.name: sysvarInstructions
docs: The sysvar instructions account.

accounts.name: authorizationRules
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules account that stores royalty enforcement rules.

accounts.name: authorizationRulesProgram
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules program account.

accounts.name: takerTa
docs: The token account of the NFT for the seller's wallet.

accounts.name: ownerTa
docs: The TA of the owner, where the NFT will be transferred to as a result of this sale.

accounts.name: poolTa
docs: The TA of the pool, where the NFT token is temporarily escrowed as a result of this sale.

accounts.name: ownerTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata owner/buyer token record account of the NFT.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: Either the legacy token program or token-2022.

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: The SPL associated token program.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana system program.

accounts.name: nftReceipt
docs: The NFT deposit receipt, which ties an NFT to the pool it was deposited to.

accounts.name: takerTa
docs: The token account of the seller, where the NFT will be transferred from.

accounts.name: poolTa
docs: The ATA of the pool, where the NFT will be transferred to.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: Either the legacy token program or token-2022.

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: The SPL associated token program.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana system program.

docs: The NFT receipt account denoting that an NFT has been deposited into this pool.

accounts.name: ammProgram
docs: The AMM program account, used for self-cpi logging.

accounts.name: escrowProgram
docs: The escrow program account for shared liquidity pools.

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account of the NFT.

accounts.name: takerTa
docs: The token account of the NFT for the seller's wallet.

accounts.name: ownerTa
docs: The ATA of the owner, where the NFT will be transferred to as a result of this sale.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: The Token 2022 program.

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: The SPL associated token program.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana system program.

instructions.name: sellNftTradePoolT22
docs: Sell a Token22 NFT into a Trade pool.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool and the buyer/recipient of the NFT.

accounts.name: taker
docs: The taker is the user buying or selling the NFT.

accounts.name: rentPayer
docs: The original rent payer of the pool--stored on the pool. Used to refund rent in case the pool
is auto-closed.

accounts.name: feeVault
docs: Fee vault account owned by the TFEE program.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The Pool state account that the NFT is being sold into. Stores pool state and config,
but is also the owner of any NFTs in the pool, and also escrows any SOL.
Any active pool can be specified provided it is a Token type and the NFT passes at least one
whitelist condition.

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: The whitelist account that the pool uses to verify the NFTs being sold into it.

accounts.name: mintProof
docs: Optional account which must be passed in if the NFT must be verified against a
merkle proof condition in the whitelist.

accounts.name: sharedEscrow
docs: The shared escrow account for pools that have liquidity in a shared account.

accounts.name: makerBroker
docs: The account that receives the maker broker fee.

accounts.name: takerBroker
docs: The account that receives the taker broker fee.

accounts.name: cosigner
docs: The optional cosigner account that must be passed in if the pool has a cosigner.

accounts.name: ammProgram
docs: The AMM program account, used for self-cpi logging.

accounts.name: escrowProgram
docs: The escrow program account for shared liquidity pools.

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account of the NFT.

accounts.name: nftReceipt
docs: The NFT deposit receipt, which ties an NFT to the pool it was deposited to.

accounts.name: takerTa
docs: The token account of the NFT for the seller's wallet.

accounts.name: poolTa
docs: The ATA of the pool, where the NFT will be transferred to.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: The Token 2022 program.

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: The SPL associated token program.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana system program.

accounts.name: AssetDepositReceipt
docs: Represents Assets deposited into a Trade or NFT pool.
Seeds: "nft_receipt", asset, pool
Dummy struct to allow Kinobi to generate the PDA seeds.
This is the deposit receipt for NFT standards that have "asset" addresses instead of "mint" addresses.

accounts.name: NftDepositReceipt
docs: Represents NFTs deposited into a Trade or NFT pool.
Seeds: "nft_receipt", mint, pool

accounts.name: Pool
docs: `Pool` is the main state account in the AMM program and represents the AMM pool where trades can happen.
`Pool` accounts are Program Derived Addresses derived  from the seeds: `"pool"`, `owner`, and `identifier`.

fields.name: version
docs: Pool version, used to control upgrades.

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for the pool PDA.

fields.name: poolId
docs: Owner-chosen identifier for the pool

fields.name: createdAt
docs: Unix timestamp of the pool creation, in seconds.

fields.name: updatedAt
docs: Unix timestamp of the last time the pool has been updated, in seconds.

fields.name: expiry
docs: Unix timestamp of when the pool expires, in seconds.

fields.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool.

fields.name: whitelist
docs: The whitelist of the pool, determining which NFTs can be deposited or sold into the pool.

fields.name: amount
docs: The amount of currency held in the pool.

fields.name: priceOffset
docs: The difference between the number of buys and sells
where a postive number indicates the taker has BOUGHT more NFTs than sold
and a negative number indicates the taker has SOLD more NFTs than bought.
This is used to calculate the current price of the pool.

fields.name: nftsHeld
docs: The number of NFTs currently held in the pool.

fields.name: stats
docs: Various stats about the pool, including the number of buys and sells.

fields.name: sharedEscrow
docs: If an escrow account is present, it means it's a shared-escrow pool where liquidity is shared with other pools.
Default pubkey is interpreted as no value.

fields.name: cosigner
docs: An offchain actor that signs off to make sure an offchain condition is met (eg trait present).
Default pubkey is interpreted as no value.

fields.name: makerBroker
docs: Maker broker fees will be sent to this address if populated.
Default pubkey is interpreted as no value.

fields.name: maxTakerSellCount
docs: Limit how many buys a pool can execute - useful for shared escrow pools, else keeps buying into infinity.

fields.name: config
docs: Pool configuration values.

fields.name: reserved
docs: Reserved space for future upgrades.

types.name: CreatePoolArgs
docs: Create pool arguments.

types.name: EditPoolArgs
docs: Edit pool arguments.

types.name: BuySellEvent
docs: Event emitted when a user buys or sells tokens.

types.name: PoolConfig
docs: Configuration values for a pool define the type of pool, curve, and other parameters.

types.name: PoolStats
docs: Stats for a pool include the number of buys and sells, and the accumulated MM profit.

types.name: AuthorizationDataLocal
docs: Local version of `AuthorizationData` for IDL export.

types.name: TaggedPayload
docs: Local version of `TaggedPayload` for IDL export.

types.name: SeedsVecLocal
docs: Local version of `SeedsVec` for IDL export.

fields.name: seeds
docs: The vector of derivation seeds.

types.name: ProofInfoLocal
docs: Local version of `ProofInfo` for IDL export.

fields.name: proof
docs: The merkle proof.

types.name: TAmmEvent
docs: Enum for events emitted by the AMM program.

types.name: PoolType
docs: Enum representing the different types of pools.
Token pools are single-sided pools that hold SOL and NFTs can be sold into them.
NFT pools are single-sided pools that hold NFTs and NFTs can be purchased from them.
Trade pools are double-sided pools that hold SOL and NFTs and can be used to trade between the two.

types.name: CurveType
docs: Enum representing the different types of curves that can be used in a pool.
Linear curves have price offsets that increase or decrease linearly.
Exponential curves have a price offset that increases or decreases exponentially.

types.name: Direction
docs: Indicates the direction of a price shift.

types.name: TakerSide
docs: Indicates the side of the taker.

types.name: PayloadTypeLocal
docs: Local version of `PayloadType` for IDL export.

errors.name: WrongPoolType
errors.msg: operation not permitted on this pool type

errors.name: PriceMismatch
errors.msg: specified price not within current price

errors.name: ExistingNfts
errors.msg: cannot close pool with nfts in escrow -- withdraw all before closing

errors.name: FeesNotAllowed
errors.msg: fees not allowed for non-trade pools

errors.name: PoolOnSharedEscrow
errors.msg: expected a non-shared escrow pool to be passed in

errors.name: CannotUseSharedEscrow
errors.msg: cannot use shared escrow in NFT pools

errors.name: MaxTakerSellCountExceeded
errors.msg: max taker sell count exceeded, pool cannot buy anymore NFTs

errors.name: MaxTakerSellCountTooSmall
errors.msg: max taker sell count is too small

errors.name: StartingPriceTooSmall
errors.msg: starting price can't be smaller than 1 lamport

errors.name: PoolInsufficientRent
errors.msg: Pool must keep minimum rent balance
